text: Dobravica (; Leksikon občin kraljestev in dežel zastopanih v državnem zboru, vol. 6: Kranjsko. 1906. Vienna: C. Kr. Dvorna in Državna Tiskarna, p. 112.) is a settlement in the Municipality of Ig in central Slovenia. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Inner Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Ig municipal site ==Church== Saint Gregory's Church The local church, built on a small hill in the centre of the settlement, is dedicated to Saint Gregory and belongs to the Parish of Ig. It is a Baroque church, built in the mid-18th century.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 2567 ==References== ==External links== *Dobravica on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Ig
title: Dobravica, Ig
